column3: Latest;Stung Treng:------ A man from Lao was arrested carrying three large packages of illegal drugs in Stung Treng province on October 2
column5: 2019 along the National Road No 7 in Ou Svay
column6: Stung Treng province “Special Unit 9” in cooperation with Stung Treng BLO launched the crackdown on a 35-year-old male Laotian national.------Around 3 kg of methamphetamine and 2 mobile phones were seized. The suspect is being detained by the Stung Treng Police Department.------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
